divs: Sighting DetailsMyself, my wife and my father-in-law all witnessed a UFO in the skies above South East London during a storm in the distance. It was a spherical object, and we noticed it from the balcony of my in-laws flat. It was darting in and out of a dark grey storm cloud at odd angles of trajectory, and at great speed. It did this for about 2-3 minutes. I witnessed it again about 5 minutes later, but this time it was moving faster and had a visible trail behind it. We all lost sight of it after then, and the storm clouds dissipaited about 15 minutes later.
Summary: Observed a UFO during a storm darting through clouds at speed.
trends: There have been 91 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around April 12th 2012
